meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pete Tachibana Andrea Keppers John Avila Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7447.

td.p: Pete Tachibana, a bartender from North Highlands, California
Andrea Keppers, a history educator from Denver, Colorado
John Avila, an attorney from Arlington, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,001)

tr.td: SOMETHING TO READ
SCRAMBLED KEGS
(Alex: You're dealing with anagrammed beer brands.)
SHADES OF YELLOW
COLLEGE FOOTBALL HISTORY
THE CONSTITUTION
PRE-AMBLE
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that comes before "amble" in the dictionary.)
